alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Foothills; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 17 at 1:30AM MST until December 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Butte County, the Northern Foot Hills, the Pennington County Plains, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Northern Foothills; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills
